summary: This is an email containing a link to a New York Times article reporting that Deutsche Bank flagged suspicious overseas money transfers made by Jeffrey Epstein. The email was sent from an iPhone on July 23, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the New York Times article, whose overseas money transfers were flagged by Deutsche Bank as suspicious.

events.title: NYT Article on Epstein's Flagged Bank Transactions
events.description: The New York Times publishes an article reporting that Deutsche Bank flagged suspicious overseas money transfers made by Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein moved money overseas in transactions that were flagged as suspicious by his bank, Deutsche Bank.
The information was reported in a New York Times article on July 23, 2019.
The document is an email containing a link to this article, sent from an iPhone.
